body:
Bug Fixes:* Correct the description of the return value fordaemon.is_detach_process_context_required.Closes: Pagure #6.
* Set a sensible default forDistribution.script_name.This works around a bug in Setuptools which calls commands before theDistribution is initialised.Closes: Pagure #2.
Changes:* The test suite now relies on the test discovery feature in ‘unittest’. This
  feature is in Python version 2.7 and later.
* Improve performance ofdaemon.close_all_open_files.Thanks to Darek Działak for the implementation.Closes: Pagure #10.
